page.title: 07FECKENHAM COFE FIRST SCHOOL5
page.content:
THE END OF TERM CONCERT-A PUPIL
We had to come back to school on Friday at 6.20. All the Mums and Dads were in the hall. We sat on the blocks. We all had to wear our school uniforms. We sang lots of songs. My favourite songs were the cowboy songs and the Trolley Song. The little ones sang There was a princess long ago while I played it on the recorder. I also had to play the triangle. We did some Country dances. I did "Oh Johnny". Then the leavers did a play, it was funny. At 7.30 we went home.
